title: Clean Streets Initiative
description: A project focused on maintaining clean streets by involving the local community in daily waste management practices.

title: E-Waste Recycling Drive
description: A campaign to collect and properly recycle electronic waste, reducing harmful environmental impact.

title: Water Waste Management
description: An initiative that tackles water waste by educating residents on efficient water use and proper disposal methods.

title: Animal Waste Collection
description: A service dedicated to the safe and hygienic disposal of dead animals, keeping neighborhoods clean and disease-free.

title: Community Clean-Up Events
description: Regular clean-up drives organized in collaboration with local volunteers to remove litter and beautify public spaces.

title: Compost and Green Waste Management
description: A system that promotes composting of organic waste, turning it into valuable resources for gardening and landscaping.
